keyMappings:
unmap x
unmap X
unmap <c-m>

map d removeTab
map u restoreTab
map M Marks.activateGotoMode
map <c-p> togglePinTab
map  yk duplicateTab
map   yc duplicateTab
map  <a-e> Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map <pp> openCopiedUrlInNewTab 
map <PP> openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map <a-f> LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
unbind B
map <c-k> goNext
searchEngines:
aur: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages?O=0&SeB=nd&K=%s&outdated=&SB=l&SO=d&PP=250&submit=Go

aw: https://wiki.archlinux.org/?search=%s
